class Solution(object):
    def maxCandies(self, status, candies, keys, containedBoxes, initialBoxes):
        """
        :type status: List[int]
        :type candies: List[int]
        :type keys: List[List[int]]
        :type containedBoxes: List[List[int]]
        :type initialBoxes: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        visited = set()
        used = set()
        curr_keys = set()
        self.ans = 0

        queue = []
        
        queue.extend(initialBoxes)

        while queue:
            curr = queue.pop(0)
            if curr in used:
                continue
            if status[curr] == 1 or curr in curr_keys:
                self.ans += candies[curr]
                used.add(curr)
                for key in keys[curr]:
                    curr_keys.add(key)
                    if key in visited:
                        queue.append(key)
                        visited.remove(key)
                for b in containedBoxes[curr]:
                    queue.append(b)
            else:
                visited.add(curr)
        
        return self.ans
